name: AfrikBoutik
tag_list: african-art, african-mask, african-oil-painting, kente-scarves, gifts, traditional-african-clothing
overview:
AfrikBoutik.com has been delivering authentic African products to customers all around the world since 2005. AfrikBoutik pride ourselves on offering the highest quality one-of-a-kind African goods; whether you want to buy African art sculptures, djembes drums, African clothing, handcrafted jewellery, African masks, leather bags, or African oil paintings, you can count on us to provide you with the best quality products available.

AfrikBoutik donâ€™t stock generic mass-produced items; every product on AfrikBoutik.com has been created by a skilled African craftsman, and represents authentic African culture. In addition, AfrikBoutik continually work with new artisans and add new items to our store to make sure you always have access to the best and latest goods on the African market! Our artisans are all extremely talented, and they hand-make their native art pieces, clothing and jewellery, in the traditional way of the tribes where the art originated. There is no substitute for authenticity; if you want genuine African products AfrikBoutik.com is the best store for you.

AfrikBoutik also provide the highest level of customer service and guarantees the authenticity of each item on our website and offer an unconditional money-back guarantee on each purchase. Furthermore, you can feel good about every purchase you make through us; each time you buy an item from our store you are helping our artisans and craftsmen in Ghana support themselves and their families while contributing to their local economy.
